data.author: Tawfīq al-Ḥakīm
data.quote: My ambition is greater than my effort. My effort is greater than my talent. And my talent is a hostage of my temper. But I persist.

data.author: André Gide
data.quote: It is better to be hated for what you are than loved for what you aren't.

data.author: Tawfīq al-Ḥakīm
data.quote: Most people live way too long in the past. The past is a springboard to jump forward from, not a sofa to relax on.

data.author: Truman Capote
data.quote: Failure is the spice that gives success its taste

data.author: Jacques Brel
data.quote: Talent doesn't exist. Talent is wanting to do something.

data.author: Socrate
data.quote: Falling is not failing. Failing is staying where you fell.

data.author: Cervantes
data.quote: When a door closes, another one opens up.

data.author: Samuel Becket
data.quote: Thriving for small things is achieving big things.

data.author: Jean-Paul Sartre
data.quote: In life, you don't do what you want but you are responsible for what you are.

data.author: Walt Disney
data.quote: If we have the courage to follow them, all dreams coome true.

data.author: Voltaire
data.quote: I decided to be happy because it's good for my health.

data.author: Albert Camus
data.quote: The way doesn't matter, ambition is enough to get anywhere.

data.author: Coluche
data.quote: The doors of the future are open to whoever can push them.

data.author: Winston Churchill
data.quote: Success is going from failure to failure without losing your enthusiasm.

data.author: Confucius
data.quote: You will never find what you don't look for.

data.author: François Mauriac
data.quote: Our life is worth what it costed us in efforts.

data.author: Georges Clémenceau
data.quote: There is only one way to fail, it is by giving up before succeeding.

data.author: Zig Ziglar
data.quote: The pessimistic says: «I'll it believe when I see it». The optimistic says «I'll see it when I believe it».

data.author: Prosper de Crébillon
data.quote: Success is the son of courage.

data.author: Hegel
data.quote: Nothing big is accomplished without passion.
